title: Hockey, Horses, and Dragon
summary: Top Down -  Mix Jam 12. Ride a horse, hit a hockey to damage a Dragon Boss.
description: This was a turning point in my game development journey. For a while, I thought I could just “feel it out” without really understanding the basics of game design. The game had everything I wanted on paper, yet still felt bland at best. Finishing it made me realize how little I knew about fun—and it sparked my deep dive into the theory and craft of game design.
